name: Module to pre-populate an instrument with data from a previous event / instance

authors.name: Christian Erhardt
authors.institution: Hertie Institute for Clinical Brain Research, University Hospital Tuebingen

description:
This module pre-populates one or more instruments with data from a previous event / instance.
In a longitudinal project instruments will be pre-populated with data from the most current event data. In a classic project instruments will be pre-populated with data from the last instance (if repeating instances for the instruments are enabled). More detailed instructions are on the github page

project-settings.name: Field that contains visit date (with date validation type) (only necessary for longitudinal projects)
Load previous data only if intrument matches these states
